channel.title: Email on PrestaShop Specs
channel.description: Recent content in Email on PrestaShop Specs

item.title: View e-mail
item.description: E-mail3 separate blocks are displayed in this page EmailIn this section the emails, and the count of them are displayed. Settings wheelWhen clicking on the settings wheel, the following options are displayed: Import After clicking on it, the Advanced parameters > Import page is opened. Refresh list After clicking on it, the page is reloaded. Show SQL query After clicking on it, the SQL query is displayed in a modal.
